subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: Armstrong told friends that his conversation with the head of the United States Anti-Doping Agency, a longtime nemesis, went well and that he was hopeful of further talks.
snippet: Armstrong told friends that his conversation with the head of the United States Anti-Doping Agency, a longtime nemesis, went well and that he was hopeful of further talks.
